title: Statistics
quote: Unlock the power of data with these statistical insights!

questions.question: What is the mean of the data set {2, 4, 6, 8, 10}?
What is the median of the data set {1, 3, 5, 7, 9}?
What is the mode of the data set {2, 4, 4, 6, 8}?
What is the formula for standard deviation?
What is the range of the data set {3, 7, 2, 8, 6}?
